title: Taliban Close In on Afghanistan’s Panjshir Valley, Putting Pressure on Resistance Haven
content:
1. Taliban Close In on Afghanistan’s Panjshir Valley, Putting Pressure on Resistance Haven  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Afghan President Ashraf Ghani fled Kabul so quickly fearing execution by the Taliban that aides who returned from a lunch break wondered where he'd gone  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Kabul Evacuation: The Unsung Hero Whose Phone Call To Indian Officials Helped Avert Abduction Bid  CRUX
  4. Inclusive govt to be formed within days: Mujahid  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. The Observer view on the resurgence of the Taliban  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガニスタンのパンジシール渓谷にタリバンが迫り、抵抗勢力の拠点に圧力をかける
塔利班逼近阿富汗潘杰希尔谷地，对抵抗力量的庇护所造成压力
